problem.markdown:
1. In biological reactions proteins play a role of a ______________ ? () Reactant. () Product. (x) Catalyst. () Does not play any role.
2. Protein is a polymer. Monomeric unit of which is amino acid. Each amino acid has a chiral center. So is it possible to apply CD spectrum to study the structure of a protein? (x) Yes. () No. () The given information is not enough. Can not conclude. () CD spectroscopy may be used for some protein not all.
3. Having known the primary structure of a protein the main interest of biologists is to know the secondary structure of a protein. How a spectroscopic method can help it? () Response only for a particular secondary structure, for others structures remain silent. (x) Give signature spectra for each different secondary structure. () Spectroscoppic methods can not help. () can not say.
